title: FBD of an object at rest on a ramp

content.question: An object is at rest on a rough incline, as shown in the figure above. Which of the following free-body diagrams best shows all of the forces acting on the object?

choices.label: The figure shows a free body diagram with three arrows extending from a common point on an object. A medium arrow extends upward and to the right. Another medium arrow extends vertically downward. A short arrow extends slightly upward and to the left.

content.answer: The figure shows a free body diagram with three arrows extending from a common point on an object. A medium arrow extends upward and to the right. Another medium arrow extends vertically downward. A short arrow extends slightly upward and to the left.
